name: Keto Eggwiches
description: Keto eggwiches are easy to make and taste great. Give them a try today. Read on to get the recipe.

publisher.name: Ruled Me
publisher.description: Ruling the Keto Diet & Getting in Shape - Guides | Recipes | Tips

recipeInstructions.text: Measure out and prepare all of the ingredients.
In a bowl, combine the eggs, heavy cream, chopped bacon, chopped spinach, salt, and pepper. Mix together until everything is combined well.
In a frying pan over medium heat, add oil and an egg ring. This will help to create a perfect circle.
Add the mixture into the egg ring until it gets full. Let this cook for about 2 minutes.
Remove the egg ring and flip. Let the other side cook for about 1-2 minutes. Repeat this until all of the egg mixture is gone.
On top of an egg circle, add the cooked breakfast sausage and a slice of cheese. Top with another egg circle.
